whyComputerScience.intro: It was at the end of middle school that I became interested in web development and started writing my first HTML tags. This was followed by several
whyComputerScience.around: around web applications and Discord bots – like
whyComputerScience.thatFollowedMe: which followed me for several years.
whyComputerScience.moreThanHobby: More than a hobby, programming has become a passion and I decided to pursue my studies in this field.

whatILike.intro: Today, at {age} years old, I enjoy developing quality applications, focusing on performance and user experience – not forgetting, of course,
whatILike.onGoing: In my spare time, I still continue to develop personal projects, whether to learn new technologies or simply for the sheer pleasure of creating tools that are useful to everyone.

privacy.dataContent:
No personal data is collected or stored on this website.

However, cookies essential to the functioning of the website are used (theme, language).
Cookies are stored on your computer's hard drive and not in a database, and you can delete them at any time.
